title: Angular Core
description: The fundamental building blocks of Angular applications.
details: Includes NgModules, bootstrapping, and the Angular CLI.

title: Components
description: The main building blocks for UI in Angular applications.
details: Components combine a template, a class, and metadata.

title: Templates
description: HTML with Angular-specific syntax for dynamic views.
details: Templates use interpolation, property binding, and event binding.

title: Directives
description: Classes that add behavior to elements in Angular applications.
details: Includes structural directives (*ngIf, *ngFor) and attribute directives (ngStyle, ngClass).

title: Services & DI
description: Mechanisms for sharing data and functionality across components.
details: Services are singletons, and Dependency Injection (DI) is used to provide them.
